dcterms:description: A dataset containing 279 Process Execution Graphs (PEGs) representing document-level lab protocols, annotated with a novel interactive textual simulator that tracks entity traits and semantic constraints during annotation.
dcterms:title: X-WLP

dcterms:creator: Ronen Tamari

Nelson Liu
Reut Tsarfaty
Dafna Shahaf
dcterms:description: A dynamic framework providing fine-grained control over task generation in the bAbI benchmark, allowing for the creation of new tasks requiring compositional generalization.
dcterms:title: Dyna-bAbI

dcterms:creator: Kyle Richardson
Ronen Tamari
Oren Sultan
Dafna Shahaf
Reut Tsarfaty
Ashish Sabharwal
dcterms:description: A dataset for the TRIP benchmark consisting of three tiered tasks: plausibility, consistency, and verifiability, focusing on commonsense reasoning.
dcterms:title: TRIP

dcterms:creator: Ronen Tamari
Daniel Friedman
William Fischer
Lauren Hebert
Dafna Shahaf
dcterms:description: A framework for decentralized, open-source, stigmergic annotation aimed at improving collective sensemaking in online environments.
dcterms:title: Open Source Attention
